ch0041_00_nejiki/0101_0701_01_10:
Whoa! Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You’re here, just as I predicted!
ch0041_00_nejiki/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m so ecstatic you came, I’m crackling
with energy! Come on—time to start the day!
ch0041_00_nejiki/0601_0701_01_10:
Electivire is a fierce, robust Pokémon
that can harness the power of electricity!
ch0041_00_nejiki/0601_0701_02_10:
If you touch Electivire while it’s
charged up with crackling electricity...
ch0041_00_nejiki/0601_0701_03_10:
you can actually lose consciousness for
several moments. So make sure you don’t
EVER do that, OK?
ch0041_00_nejiki/0601_0702_01_10:
Electivire are incredibly rare to
find in the wild, you know.
ch0041_00_nejiki/0601_0702_02_10:
If you ever manage to team up with one,
you can be sure it will be a dependable partner.
ch0041_00_nejiki/0602_0701_01_10:
Grrr... Still at 47 percent?
Slower than I expected.
ch0041_00_nejiki/0602_0701_02_10:
Whoa! I was so focused, I
didn’t even see you there!
ch0041_00_nejiki/0602_0701_03_10:
I was trying to perform an update on
my data-interpreting machine, see...
ch0041_00_nejiki/0602_0701_04_10:
But it’s taking forever! The update’s already
been going for a hundred hours or so!
ch0041_00_nejiki/0602_0702_01_10:
This is just the mobile version of my
data-interpreting machine, but it’s got
amazing functionality!
ch0041_00_nejiki/0602_0702_02_10:
I’ll tell you all about what this baby
can do next time.
ch0041_00_nejiki/0602_0702_03_10:
If we open that can of worms now,
it’ll be midnight before I can explain
all of its awesome features.
ch0041_00_nejiki/0603_0701_01_10:
Bronzong can call down the rain,
so people in ancient times used to
think they were deities.
ch0041_00_nejiki/0603_0701_02_10:
In fact, some people still worship them
as rain bringers today, if you can
believe that.
ch0041_00_nejiki/0603_0701_03_10:
I don’t really buy into that, though.
The only results I believe in are the ones
I can prove numerically.
ch0041_00_nejiki/0603_0701_04_10:
Besides, if it suddenly started raining
indoors, all of my machines would break.
ch0041_00_nejiki/0603_0702_01_10:
Did you know that many Pokémon
feel naturally energized by the rain?
ch0041_00_nejiki/0603_0702_02_10:
For that reason, a lot of Pokémon
feel thankful toward Bronzong, too.
ch0041_00_nejiki/0604_0701_01_10:
You look like you’re itching to
know more about me!
ch0041_00_nejiki/0604_0701_02_10:
In other words, you’d like to interpret
my data. Is that correct?
If so, feel free!
ch0041_00_nejiki/0604_0701_03_10:
Let’s see. Um... Male, teenager...
No, that’s not the sort of data you
want, is it?
ch0041_00_nejiki/0604_0701_04_10:
If you want to learn more about me, you’ll
need to collect some data. Spending time
with me is the best way to do that.
ch0041_00_nejiki/0604_0701_05_10:
It just so happens that I’m interested
in collecting some data on you as well.
Nice timing!
ch0041_00_nejiki/0604_0702_01_10:
There are plenty of things out there
that you can’t understand with just
a calculator.
ch0041_00_nejiki/0604_0702_02_10:
The more you learn about the world,
the more you’ll find things about it
that interest you.
ch0041_00_nejiki/0605_0701_01_10: Do you think my hairstyle is weird?
ch0041_00_nejiki/0605_0701_02_10:
I’m really specific about how I do it,
but it doesn’t take long at all.
ch0041_00_nejiki/0605_0701_03_10:
That could be because I use my invention
the Auto-Hairstyle-O-Matic to analyze
my hair type.
ch0041_00_nejiki/0605_0701_04_10:
Want to try it out, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
My invention can turn any hairstyle
into one that’s just like mine.
ch0041_00_nejiki/0605_0702_01_10:
My Auto-Hairstyle-O-Matic doesn’t
work on bald people.
ch0041_00_nejiki/1701_0701_01_10:
My invention the Detect-O-Matic
picked this up out in the forest.
ch0041_00_nejiki/1701_0701_02_10:
I did a round of analysis on it,
and it seemed right up your alley!
ch0041_00_nejiki/1701_0702_01_10:
Collecting data and performing analyses
are important for all things in life.
ch0041_00_nejiki/1701_0702_02_10:
They are the key to obtaining greater
knowledge and experience.
ch0041_00_nejiki/2501_0701_01_10:
Whoa! Hey, you!
You came at just the right time!
ch0041_00_nejiki/2501_0701_02_10:
I’ve been wanting to do some
analysis on you. Give me your data!
ch0041_00_nejiki/2501_0701_03_10:
Don’t worry—I don’t need you to do
anything super specific. I just need to
look at you through my machine!
ch0041_00_nejiki/2501_0702_01_10:
Bzweeeeep!
Oh, don’t let the beeping concern you.
I’m just interpreting some of your data.
ch0041_00_nejiki/2501_0702_02_10:
You and your Pokémon continue to
exceed my calculations.
What’s the secret to your strength?
ch0041_00_nejiki/2501_0702_03_10:
Hmm... I’ve just gotta know!
I’m going to solve this mystery
through my analysis. I promise!
ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0701_01_10:
If you collect lots of data and analyze
your Pokémon battles, you can utilize
that data moving forward!
ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0701_02_10:
It’s true! It’s part of my job description
as Factory Head!
ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0701_03_10:
Pokémon get disappointed when they lose
battles, too. That’s why you’ve got to
formulate new strategies!
ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0701_04_10:
So that you can learn from your mistakes!
And so next time, you can win!
And things will go exactly as planned!
ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0702_01_10:
I always get tons of great data
when I battle against you.
ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0702_02_10:
It’ll all be put to good use when
I go back to the Battle Factory!
ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0702_03_10:
Although I might as well collect as
much data as I can while I’m here...
ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0702_04_10:
The more knowledge I can amass,
the more helpful I can be to you
in a battle.
ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0702_05_10:
AND I can keep getting stronger
in the meantime! Perfect logic,
just as I calculated!
ch0041_00_nejiki/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! According to my analysis,
we’re in for a fine day!
ch0041_00_nejiki/3002_0701_01_10:
I always make excellent progress when
I study Pokémon in the morning.
ch0041_00_nejiki/3003_0701_01_10:
Greetings.
My calculations tell me that the current air 
temperature and humidity are optimal for battle.
ch0041_00_nejiki/3004_0701_01_10:
Creating a plan and then executing it is
the most efficient way to spend the day.
ch0041_00_nejiki/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening. How much do you know
about nocturnal Pokémon?
ch0041_00_nejiki/3006_0701_01_10:
Each night, I like to review my accomplishments
of the day and evaluate my efficiency.
